alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:37PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns, Wright and Sherburne Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt upstream snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 745 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 10.0 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 03/30/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
